IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'CsvTextFormatCustomer3') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [CsvTextFormatCustomer3] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'dsDataLakeCustomer3') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [dsDataLakeCustomer3] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://discosmarbi@dlsmartbi.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.stgCustomer') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.stgCustomer
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.stgCustomer (
            /* 02. Definir formato dos dados COLLATE */
            CustomerID VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            FirstName VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            LastName VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            FullName VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/AdvWorks_Stage/customer.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [dsDataLakeCustomer3],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CsvTextFormatCustomer3]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.stgCustomer
GO
